Template.title: Continuity of Care Document (CCD) (V3)
Template.Description:
This document type was originally based on the Continuity of Care Document (CCD) Release 1.1 which itself was derived from HITSP C32 and CCD Release 1.0.
The Continuity of Care Document (CCD) represents a core data set of the most relevant administrative, demographic, and clinical information facts about a patient's healthcare, covering one or more healthcare encounters. It provides a means for one healthcare practitioner, system, or setting to aggregate all of the pertinent data about a patient and forward it to another to support the continuity of care.
The primary use case for the CCD is to provide a snapshot in time containing the germane clinical, demographic, and administrative data for a specific patient. The key characteristic of a CCD is that the ServiceEvent is constrained to "PCPR". This means it does not function to report new ServiceEvents associated with performing care. It reports on care that has already been provided. The CCD provides a historical tally of the care over a range of time and is not a record of new services delivered.
More specific use cases, such as a Discharge Summary, Transfer Summary, Referral Note, Consultation Note, or Progress Note, are available as alternative documents in this guide.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-8450) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32516).

When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-17180).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="34133-9" Summarization of Episode Note (CONF:1198-17181).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-32138).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:statusCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] copyTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:1198-9442).
Such authors SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:1198-9443).
Such assignedAuthors **SHALL** contain (exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson) or (exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthoringDevice and exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization)

If assignedAuthor has an associated representedOrganization with no assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice, then the value for “ClinicalDocument/author/assignedAuthor/id/@NullFlavor” **SHALL** be “NA” “Not applicable” 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1008 NullFlavor STATIC.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf (CONF:1198-8452).
Constraint.Description: The documentationOf relationship in a Continuity Care Document contains the representation of providers who are wholly or partially responsible for the safety and well-being of a subject of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:1198-8480).
Constraint.Description:
The main activity being described by a CCD is the provision of healthcare over a period of time. This is shown by setting the value of serviceEvent/@classCode to “PCPR” (care provision) and indicating the duration over which care was provided in serviceEvent/effectiveTime. Additional data from outside this duration may also be included if it is relevant to care provided during that time range (e.g., reviewed during the stated time range).
NOTE: Implementations originating a CCD should take care to discover what the episode of care being summarized is. For example, when a patient fills out a form providing relevant health history, the episode of care being documented might be from birth to the present.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PCPR" Care Provision (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 STATIC) (CONF:1198-8453).
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-8481).
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-8454).
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:1198-8455).
This serviceEvent SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:1198-8482).
Constraint.Description: The serviceEvent/performer represents the healthcare providers involved in the current or pertinent historical care of the patient. Preferably, the patient’s key healthcare providers would be listed, particularly their primary physician and any active consulting physicians, therapists, and counselors.

Constraint.NarrativeText: The performer, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" Participation physical performer (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 STATIC) (CONF:1198-8458).
The performer, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity (CONF:1198-8459).
The assignedEntity, if present, SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-30882) such that it
If this assignedEntity is an assignedPerson, the assignedEntity/id **SHOULD** contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier
The assignedEntity, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson (CONF:1198-32467).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedDocument (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30659).
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody (CONF:1198-30660).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30661) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30662).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30663) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medications Section (entries required) (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30664).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30665) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30666).
This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30667) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (entries required) (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30668).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30669) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Results Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.3.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30670).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30671) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Advance Directives Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30672).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30673) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Encounters Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30674).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30675) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Family History Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.15:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30676).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30677) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Functional Status Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.14:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30678).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30679) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunizations Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30680).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30681) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medical Equipment Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.23:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30682).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30683) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Payers Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.18:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30684).
This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30685) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30686).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30687) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30688).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30689) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30690).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-32143) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Mental Status Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.56:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-32144).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-32624) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Nutrition Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.57) (CONF:1198-32625).

Template.Sample: <author> <time value="201209151030-0800" /> <assignedAuthor> <id extension="5555555555" root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" /> <code code="207QA0505X" displayName="Adult Medicine" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="Healthcare Provider Taxonomy" /> <addr> <streetAddressLine>1004 Healthcare Drive </streetAddressLine> <city>Portland</city> <state>OR</state> <postalCode>99123</postalCode> <country>US</country> </addr> <telecom use="WP" value="tel:+1(555)555-1004" /> <assignedPerson> <name> <given>Patricia</given> <given qualifier="CL">Patty</given> <family>Primary</family> <suffix qualifier="AC">M.D.</suffix> </name> </assignedPerson> </assignedAuthor> </author>

<performer typeCode="PRF"> <functionCode code="PCP" displayName="Primary Care Physician" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.88" codeSystemName="HL7ParticipationFunction"> <originalText>Primary Care Physician</originalText> </functionCode> <assignedEntity> <id extension="5555555555" root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" /> <code code="207QA0505X" displayName="Adult Medicine" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="NUCC" /> <addr> ... </addr> <telecom use="WP" value="tel:+1(555)555-1004" /> <assignedPerson> <name> <given>Patricia</given> <given qualifier="CL">Patty</given> <family>Primary</family> <suffix qualifier="AC">M.D.</suffix> </name> </assignedPerson> <representedOrganization> ... </representedOrganization> </assignedEntity> </performer>

<documentationOf> <serviceEvent classCode="PCPR"> <!-- The effectiveTime reflects the provision of care summarized in the document. In this scenario, the provision of care summarized is the lifetime for the patient --> <effectiveTime> <low value="19750501" /> <!-- The low value represents when the summarized provision of care began. In this scenario, the patient's date of birth --> <high value="20120915" /> <!-- The high value represents when the summarized provision of care being ended. In this scenario, when chart summary was created --> </effectiveTime> <performer typeCode="PRF"> .... </performer> </serviceEvent> </documentationOf>

Template.title: Coverage Activity (V3)
Template.Description: A Coverage Activity groups the policy and authorization acts within a Payers Section to order the payment sources. A Coverage Activity contains one or more Policy Activities, each of which contains zero or more Authorization Activities. The Coverage Activity id is the ID from the patient's insurance card. The sequenceNumber/@value shows the policy order of preference.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-8897) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32596).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-8874).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-8876).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="48768-6" Payment sources (CONF:1198-19160).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-32156).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-8875).
This statusCode SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: HL7ActStatus urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 STATIC) (CONF:1198-19094).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-8878) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" has component (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 STATIC) (CONF:1198-8879).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1198-17174).
The sequenceNumber, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:1198-17175).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Policy Activity (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-15528).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:inFulfillmentOf1 (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60" extension="2015-08-01" /> <id root="1fe2cdd0-7aad-11db-9fe1-0800200c9a66" /> <code code="48768-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Payment sources" /> <statusCode code="completed" /> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <sequenceNumber value="2" /> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61" extension="2015-08-01" /> . . .
</act> </entryRelationship> </act>

Template.title: Deceased Observation (V3)
Template.Description: This template represents the observation that a patient has died. It also represents the cause of death, indicated by an entryRelationship type of ‘CAUS’. This template allows for more specific representation of data than is available with the use of dischargeDispositionCode.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-14871) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32541).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-14873).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14853).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CONF:1198-19135).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" (CodeSystem: HL7ActCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.4) (CONF:1198-32158).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] derivationExpr (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-14854).
This statusCode SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: HL7ActStatus urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 STATIC) (CONF:1198-19095).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-14855).
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-14874).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:1198-14857).
This value SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="419099009" Dead (CodeSystem: SNOMED CT urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 STATIC) (CONF:1198-15142).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-14868) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CAUS" Is etiology for (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 STATIC) (CONF:1198-14875).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1198-32900).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-14870).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:inFulfillmentOf1 (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79" extension="2015-08-01" /> <id root="6898fae0-5c8a-11db-b0de-0800200c9a77" /> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" /> <statusCode code="completed" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20100303" /> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="419099009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" displayName="Dead" /> <entry typeCode="DRIV"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01" /> ...
</observation> </entry> </observation>

Template.title: Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (V3)
Template.Description: This template represents problems or diagnoses present at the time of discharge which occurred during the hospitalization or need to be monitored after hospitalization. It requires at least one Problem Observation entry.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-16764) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32534).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19147).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="11535-2" Hospital discharge diagnosis (CONF:1198-19148).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-32163).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-7666) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" Has Subject (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 STATIC) (CONF:1198-7667).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-15536).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:inFulfillmentOf1 (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33" extension="2015-08-01"/> <id root="5a784260-6856-4f38-9638-80c751aff2fb" /> <code code="11535-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="HOSPITAL DISCHARGE DIAGNOSIS" /> <statusCode code="active" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="201209091904-0400" /> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="false"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <!-- Problem observation template --> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01" />
...
</observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

Template.title: Discharge Summary (V3)
Template.Description:
The Discharge Summary is a document which synopsizes a patient's admission to a hospital, LTPAC provider, or other setting. It provides information for the continuation of care following discharge. The Joint Commission requires the following information to be included in the Discharge Summary (http://www.jointcommission.org/): • The reason for hospitalization (the admission) • The procedures performed, as applicable • The care, treatment, and services provided • The patient’s condition and disposition at discharge • Information provided to the patient and family • Provisions for follow-up care
The best practice for a Discharge Summary is to include the discharge disposition in the display of the header.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-8463) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32517).

When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-17178).
Constraint.Description: The Discharge Summary recommends use of a single document type code, 18842-5 "Discharge summary", with further specification provided by author or performer, setting, or specialty. When pre-coordinated codes are used, any coded values describing the author or performer of the service act or the practice setting must be consistent with the LOINC document type.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet DischargeSummaryDocumentTypeCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.4.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-17179).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:statusCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] copyTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-8467).
Constraint.Description: The participant element in the Discharge Summary header follows the General Header Constraints for participants. Discharge Summary does not specify any use for functionCode for participants. Local policies will determine how this element should be used in implementations.

Constraint.NarrativeText: When participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode **SHALL** be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 INDRoleclassCodes **DYNAMIC** 2011-09-30
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedDocument (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf (CONF:1198-8471).
Constraint.Description: The Discharge Summary is always associated with a Hospital Admission using the encompassingEncounter element in the header.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This componentOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter (CONF:1198-8472).
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-32611).
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-8473).
Constraint.Description: The admission date is recorded in the componentOf/encompassingEncounter/effectiveTime/low.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:1198-8475).
Constraint.Description: The discharge date is recorded in the componentOf/encompassingEncounter/effectiveTime/high.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] dischargeDispositionCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet NUBC UB-04 FL17 Patient Status urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.33 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8476).
Constraint.Description: The dischargeDispositionCode records the disposition of the patient at time of discharge. Access to the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code system requires a membership. The following conformance statement aligns with HITSP C80 requirements. The dischargeDispositionCode, @displayName, or NUBC UB-04 Print Name, must be displayed when the document is rendered.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This encompassingEncounter MAY contain zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty (CONF:1198-8479).
Constraint.Description: The responsibleParty element represents only the party responsible for the encounter, not necessarily the entire episode of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: The responsibleParty, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:1198-32613).
This assignedEntity **SHALL** contain an assignedPerson or a representedOrganization or both.
This encompassingEncounter MAY contain zero or more [0..*] encounterParticipant (CONF:1198-8478).
Constraint.Description: The encounterParticipant element represents persons who participated in the encounter and not necessarily the entire episode of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: The encounterParticipant, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:1198-32615).
This assignedEntity **SHALL** contain an assignedPerson or a representedOrganization or both.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-9539).
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody (CONF:1198-30518).
Constraint.Description: In this template (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.8.2), coded entries are optional.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30519) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30520).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30521) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Hospital Course Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.5) (CONF:1198-30522).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30523) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Discharge Diagnosis Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30524).
This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30525) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Discharge Medications Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30526).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30527) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30528).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30529) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Chief Complaint Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) (CONF:1198-30530).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30531) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) (CONF:1198-30532).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30533) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Nutrition Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.57) (CONF:1198-30534).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30535) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Family History Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.15:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30536).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30537) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Functional Status Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.14:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30538).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30539) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Past Medical History (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.20:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30540).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30541) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] History of Present Illness Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.4) (CONF:1198-30542).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30543) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Admission Diagnosis Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30544).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30545) such that it

This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30547) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Hospital Consultations Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.42) (CONF:1198-30548).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30549) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Hospital Discharge Instructions Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.41) (CONF:1198-30550).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30551) such that it

This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30557) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30558).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30559) such that it

This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30561) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Reason for Visit Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) (CONF:1198-30562).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30563) such that it

This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-31586) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Discharge Medications Section (entries required) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11.1:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-31587).

This structuredBody **SHALL NOT** contain a Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) when either a Chief Complaint Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or a Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) is present

Template.Sample: <componentOf> <encompassingEncounter> <id extension="9937012" root="2.16.840.1.113883.19" /> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.12" codeSystemName="CPT" code="99213" displayName="Evaluation and Management" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20090227130000+0500" /> <high value="20090227130000+0500" /> </effectiveTime> <dischargeDispositionCode code="01" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.12.112" displayName="Routine Discharge" codeSystemName="HL7 Discharge Disposition" /> <location> <healthCareFacility> <id root="2.16.540.1.113883.19.2" /> </healthCareFacility> </location> </encompassingEncounter> </componentOf>

Template.title: Encounter Diagnosis (V3)
Template.Description: This template wraps relevant problems or diagnoses at the close of a visit or that need to be followed after the visit.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-14895) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32542).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19182).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="29308-4" Diagnosis (CONF:1198-19183).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-32160).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-14892) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 STATIC) (CONF:1198-14893).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-14898).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:inFulfillmentOf1 (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80" extension="2015-08-01" /> <code code="29308-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName=" DIAGNOSIS" /> <statusCode code="active" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20903003" /> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01" /> <!-- Problem Observation --> ...
</observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

Template.title: Family History Organizer (V3)
Template.Description: The Family History Organizer associates a set of observations with a family member. For example, the Family History Organizer can group a set of observations about the patient’s father.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-8604) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32606).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-32485).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:text (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-8602).
This statusCode SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: HL7ActStatus urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 STATIC) (CONF:1198-19099).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:1198-8609).
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject (CONF:1198-15244).
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" Person (CodeSystem: HL7EntityClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.41 STATIC) (CONF:1198-15245).
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Family Member Value urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19579 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-15246).
This relatedSubject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:1198-15248).

The subject, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-15974).
The subject, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:1198-15976).

The subject **SHOULD** contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:id. The prefix sdtc: **SHALL** be bound to the namespace “urn:hl7-org:sdtc”. The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the id element

The subject **MAY** contain zero or one [0..1] *sdtc:deceasedInd*. The prefix sdtc: **SHALL** be bound to the namespace “urn:hl7-org:sdtc”. The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedInd element

The subject **MAY** contain zero or one [0..1] *sdtc:deceasedTime*. The prefix sdtc: **SHALL** be bound to the namespace “urn:hl7-org:sdtc”. The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedTime element
The age of a relative at the time of a family history observation **SHOULD** be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with Observation/effectiveTime
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] component (CONF:1198-32428).
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Family History Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-32429).

Template.Sample: . . .

Template.title: History and Physical (V3)
Template.Description: A History and Physical (H&P) note is a medical report that documents the current and past conditions of the patient. It contains essential information that helps determine an individual's health status. The first portion of the report is a current collection of organized information unique to an individual. This is typically supplied by the patient or the caregiver, concerning the current medical problem or the reason for the patient encounter. This information is followed by a description of any past or ongoing medical issues, including current medications and allergies. Information is also obtained about the patient's lifestyle, habits, and diseases among family members. The next portion of the report contains information obtained by physically examining the patient and gathering diagnostic information in the form of laboratory tests, imaging, or other diagnostic procedures. The report ends with the clinician's assessment of the patient's situation and the intended plan to address those issues. A History and Physical Examination is required upon hospital admission as well as before operative procedures. An initial evaluation in an ambulatory setting is often documented in the form of an H&P note.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-8283) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32518).

When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-17185).
Constraint.Description: The H&P Note recommends use of a single document type code, 34117-2 "History and physical note”, with further specification provided by author or performer, setting, or specialty. When pre-coordinated codes are used, any coded values describing the author or performer of the service act or the practice setting must be consistent with the LOINC document type.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HPDocumentType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-17186).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:statusCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] copyTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:1198-32482).
The informationRecipient, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient (CONF:1198-32483).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-8286).
Constraint.Description: The participant element in the H&P header follows the General Header Constraints for participants. H&P Note does not specify any use for functionCode for participants. Local policies will determine how this element should be used in implementations.

Constraint.NarrativeText: When participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode **SHALL** be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 INDRoleclassCodes **DYNAMIC**
Constraint.Description: A special class of participant is the supporting person or organization: an individual or an organization that has a relationship to the patient, including parents, relatives, caregivers, insurance policyholders, and guarantors. In the case of a supporting person who is also an emergency contact or next-of-kin, a participant element should be present for each role recorded.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:1198-8336).
Constraint.Description: inFulfillmentOf elements describe the prior orders that are fulfilled (in whole or part) by the service events described in this document. For example, the prior order might be a referral and the H&P Note may be in partial fulfillment of that referral.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedDocument (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf (CONF:1198-8338).
Constraint.Description: The H&P Note is always associated with an encounter.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This componentOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter (CONF:1198-8339).
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-8340).
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] US Realm Date and Time (DT.US.FIELDED) (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.3) (CONF:1198-8341).
Constraint.Description: The effectiveTime represents the time interval or point in time in which the encounter took place.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This encompassingEncounter MAY contain zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty (CONF:1198-8345).
Constraint.Description: The responsibleParty element records only the party responsible for the encounter, not necessarily the entire episode of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: The responsibleParty element, if present, **SHALL** contain an assignedEntity element, which **SHALL** contain an assignedPerson element, a representedOrganization element, or both.
This encompassingEncounter MAY contain zero or more [0..*] encounterParticipant (CONF:1198-8342).
Constraint.Description: The encounterParticipant elements represent only those participants in the encounter, not necessarily the entire episode of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: An encounterParticipant element, if present, SHALL contain an assignedEntity element, which SHALL contain an assignedPerson element, a representedOrganization element, or both.
This encompassingEncounter MAY contain zero or one [0..1] location (CONF:1198-8344).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-8349).
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody (CONF:1198-30570).
Constraint.Description: In this template (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.3.2), coded entries are optional.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30571) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30572).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30573) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Assessment Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8) (CONF:1198-30574).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30575) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30576).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30577) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Assessment and Plan Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30578).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30579) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Chief Complaint Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) (CONF:1198-30580).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30581) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) (CONF:1198-30582).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30583) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Family History Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.15:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30584).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30585) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] General Status Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.5) (CONF:1198-30586).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30587) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Past Medical History (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.20:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30588).
This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30589) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] History of Present Illness Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.4) (CONF:1198-30590).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30591) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunizations Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30592).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30593) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Instructions Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-31385).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30595) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medications Section (entries optional) (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30596).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30597) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Physical Exam Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.10:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30598).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30599) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30600).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30601) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (entries optional) (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-30602).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-30603) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Reason for Visit Section (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) (CONF:1198-30604).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30605) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Results Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.3:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30606).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30607) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Review of Systems Section (identifier: urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.18) (CONF:1198-30608).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30609) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30610).
This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30611) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30612).

This structuredBody **SHALL** contain a Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) or a Chief Complaint Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or a Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12)

This structuredBody **SHALL** contain an Assessment and Plan Section (V2) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9:2014-06-09), or an Assessment Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8) and a Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09)

This structuredBody **SHALL NOT** contain an Assessment and Plan Section (V2) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9:2014-06-09) when either an Assessment Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8) or a Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09) is present.

This structuredBody **SHALL NOT** contain a Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) when either a Chief Complaint Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or a Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) is present

Template.Sample: <componentOf> <encompassingEncounter> <id extension="9937012" root="2.16.840.1.113883.19" /> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.12" codeSystemName="CPT" code="99213" displayName="Evaluation and Management" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20090227130000+0500" /> <high value="20090227130000+0500" /> </effectiveTime> <location> <healthCareFacility> <id root="2.16.540.1.113883.19.2" /> </healthCareFacility> </location> </encompassingEncounter> </componentOf>

Template.title: Past Medical History (V3)
Template.Description: This section contains a record of the patient’s past complaints, problems, and diagnoses. It contains data from the patient’s past up to the patient’s current complaint or reason for seeking medical care.
Template.Notes: STU Comment 1486: Update name of template from "History of Past Illness Section" to "Past Medical History"

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @ID (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-7828) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32536).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15474).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="11348-0" History of Past Illness (CONF:1198-15475).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-30831).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-7830).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7831).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1198-8791) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-15476).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.20" extension="2015-08-01" /> <!-- ** History of Past Illness Section ** --> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" code="11348-0" displayName="HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS" /> <title>PAST MEDICAL HISTORY</title> <text> <paragraph>Patient has had ..... </paragraph> </text> <entry> <!-- Sample With Problem Observation. --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <!-- Problem Observation --> ...
</observation> </entry> </section>

Template.title: Hospital Admission Diagnosis (V3)
Template.Description: This template represents problems or diagnoses identified by the clinician at the time of the patient’s admission. This Hospital Admission Diagnosis act may contain more than one Problem Observation to represent multiple diagnoses for a Hospital Admission.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).

This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-32162).

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-7674) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" Has Subject (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 STATIC) (CONF:1198-7675).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-15535).

<act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.34" extension="2015-08-01" /> <id root="5a784260-6856-4f38-9638-80c751aff2fb" /> <code code="46241-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Hospital Admission Diagnosis" /> <statusCode code="active" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20090303" /> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="false"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <!-- Problem observation template --> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01" /> ...
</observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

Template.title: Vital Signs Section (entries optional) (V3)
Template.Description: The Vital Signs Section contains relevant vital signs for the context and use case of the document type, such as blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, height, weight, body mass index, head circumference, pulse oximetry, temperature, and body surface area. The section should include notable vital signs such as the most recent, maximum and/or minimum, baseline, or relevant trends. Vital signs are represented in the same way as other results, but are aggregated into their own section to follow clinical conventions.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @ID (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15242).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CONF:1198-15243).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1198-30902).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-9966).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7270).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:X-X).

The section should include notable vital signs such as the most recent, maximum and/or minimum, baseline, or relevant trends. Vital signs are represented in the same way as other results, but are aggregated into their own section to follow clinical conventions.

Template.title: Transfer Summary (V2)
Template.Description: This document describes constraints on the Clinical Document Architecture (CDA) header and body elements for a Transfer Summary. The Transfer Summary standardizes critical information for exchange of information between providers of care when a patient moves between health care settings. Standardization of information used in this form will promote interoperability; create information suitable for reuse in quality measurement, public health, research, and for reimbursement.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-28239) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32907).

When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-28243).
Constraint.Description:
The Transfer Summary recommends use of the document type code 18761-7 "Provider Unspecified Transfer Summary", with further specification provided by author or performer, setting, or specialty. When pre-coordinated codes are used, any coded values describing the author or performer of the service act or the practice setting must be consistent with the LOINC document type. For example, an Obstetrics and Gynecology Transfer Summary note would not be authored by a Pediatric Cardiologist.
Pre-coordinated codes are those that indicate the specialty or service provided in the LOINC Long Common Name (Print Name in the TransferDocumentType valueSet table).
When using a generic type of code such as 18761-7 (Provider - Unspecified Transfer Summary), the types of services involved in the care are handled in documentationOf/serviceEvent with the use of serviceEvent/code (e.g., use a SNOMED CT procedure code such as 69031006 (Excision of breast tissue) while performers/providers involved in the care can be identified using the functionCode (bound to Healthcare Provider Taxonomy role codes).

Constraint.NarrativeText: This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransferDocumentType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32968).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-29838).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:statusCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] copyTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:X-X).
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-31599) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="IND" indirect (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:1198-31872).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity (CONF:1198-31600).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31873).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson (CONF:1198-31601).
This associatedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1198-31602).
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-31626) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CALLBCK" Call back contact (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:1198-31627).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity (CONF:1198-31628).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" assigned entity (CodeSystem: HL7RoleClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.110) (CONF:1198-31641).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-31629).
This associatedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:1198-31630).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1198-31631).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson (CONF:1198-31632).
This associatedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1198-31633).
This associatedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] scopingOrganization (CONF:1198-31634).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf (CONF:1198-31570).
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:1198-31571).
Constraint.Description: The serviceEvent in a Transfer Note contains the representation of providers who are wholly or partially responsible for the safety and well-being of a subject of care.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PCPR" Care Provision (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6) (CONF:1198-31572).
This serviceEvent MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-32650).
Constraint.Description: Use serviceEvent/code when using a generic document type code such as 18761-7 (Provider-Unspecified Transfer Summary) to represent the service.

Constraint.NarrativeText: This serviceEvent SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer (CONF:1198-31574) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" Participation of Physical Performer (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 DYNAMIC) (CONF:1198-31575).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy urn:oid:2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32651).
Constraint.Description: Use performer/functionCode when using a generic document type code such as 18761-7 (Provider-Unspecified Transfer Summary) to represent the provider.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedDocument (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf (CONF:X-X).

This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-28265) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Functional Status Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.14:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-28266).

This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-28277) such that it

This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-28279) such that it

Template.title: Risk Concern Act (V2)
Template.Description:
This template represents a risk concern.
It is a wrapper for a single risk concern which may be derived from a variety of sources within an EHR (such as Problem List, Family History, Social History, Social Worker Note, etc.).
A Risk Concern Act represents a health concern that is a risk. A risk is a clinical or socioeconomic condition that the patient does not currently have, but the probability of developing that condition rises to the level of concern such that an intervention and/or monitoring is needed.

Constraint.Description: The following entryRelationship represents the relationship between two Health Concern Acts where there is a general relationship between the source and the target (Health Concern RELATES TO Health Concern). SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" Refers to (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) (CONF:1198-32298).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Act (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-32299).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1198-32217) such that it
Constraint.Description: Where a Health Concern needs to reference another entry already described in the CDA document instance, rather than repeating the full content of the entry, the Entry Reference template may be used to reference this entry.

Constraint.NarrativeText: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" Refers to (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) (CONF:1198-32301).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Entry Reference (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122) (CONF:1198-32302).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference (CONF:1198-32769).
The reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" Refers to (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) (CONF:1198-32908).
The reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] External Document Reference (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.115:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-32909).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:precondition2 (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sdtc:inFulfillmentOf1 (CONF:X-X).

Template.Sample:
<!-- Risk Concern Act --> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.136" extension="2015-08-01"/> <id root="cbcbf20a-d011-449f-87d1-a23cc3e5f7cf" /> <code code="X-RISK-CONCERN-ACT" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="At risk for" /> <!-- This Health Risk has a statusCode of active because it is an active risk --> <statusCode code="active" /> <!-- The effective time is the date that the Health Risk started being followed - this does not necessarily correlate to the onset date of the contained health issues--> <effectiveTime value="20130616" /> <!-- Health Risk: Malignant neoplastic disease --> <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"> <!-- Problem Observation --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01" /> <id root="8dfacd73-1682-4cc4-9351-e54ccea83612" /> <code code="80943009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED CT" displayName="Risk factor" /> <statusCode code="completed" /> <effectiveTime> <low value="20130613" /> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="409623005" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED CT" displayName="Malignant neoplastic disease" /> </observation> </entryRelationship> ...
<!-- This entryRelationship represents the relationship "Health Risk REFERS TO Health Concern" --> <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"> <!-- Entry Reference Concern Act --> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122" /> <!-- This id points to an already defined Health Concern --> <id root="4eab0e52-dd7d-4285-99eb-72d32ddb195c" /> <code nullFlavor="NP" /> <statusCode code="completed" /> </act> </entryRelationship> </act>

Template.title: Referral Note (V2)
Template.Description: A Referral Note communicates pertinent information from a provider who is requesting services of another provider of clinical or non-clinical services. The information in this document includes the reason for the referral and additional information that would augment decision making and care delivery. Examples of referral situations are when a patient is referred from a family physician to a cardiologist for cardiac evaluation or when patient is sent by a cardiologist to an emergency department for angina or when a patient is referred by a nurse practitioner to an audiologist for hearing screening or when a patient is referred by a hospitalist to social services.

Constraint.NarrativeText: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] realmCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-28947) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32911).

When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-28949).
Constraint.Description: The Referral Note recommends use of the document type code 57133-1 "Referral Note", with further specification provided by author or performer, setting, or specialty. When pre-coordinated codes are used, any coded values describing the author or performer of the service act or the practice setting must be consistent with the LOINC document type. For example, an Obstetrics and Gynecology Referral note would not be authored by a Pediatric Cardiologist. The type of referral and the target of the referral are specified via the participant (and not via the author).

Constraint.NarrativeText: This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReferralDocumentType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.3 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32967).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sdtc:statusCode (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:X-X).

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] copyTime (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] informationRecipient (CONF:1198-31589).
This informationRecipient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient (CONF:1198-31590).
This intendedRecipient SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:1198-31591).
This intendedRecipient SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1198-31592).
This intendedRecipient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] informationRecipient (CONF:1198-31593).
This informationRecipient SHALL contain at least one [1..*] US Realm Person Name (PN.US.FIELDED) (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:1198-31594).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:X-X).

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity (CONF:1198-31643).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31925).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson (CONF:1198-31644).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-31647) such that it
Constraint.Description: This participant represents the clinician to contact for questions about the referral note. This call back contact individual may be a different person than the individual(s) identified in the author or legalAuthenticator participant.

Constraint.NarrativeText: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CALLBCK" call back contact (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 DYNAMIC) (CONF:1198-31648).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity (CONF:1198-31649).

This associatedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-31650).
This associatedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:1198-31651).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1198-31652).
This associatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson (CONF:1198-31653).
This associatedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1198-31654).
This associatedEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] scopingOrganization (CONF:1198-31655).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedDocument (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:X-X).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf (CONF:X-X).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-29062).
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody (CONF:1198-29063).
This structuredBody SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-29066) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Plan of Treatment Section (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-29067).
This structuredBody MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:1198-29068) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Advance Directives Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-29069).
